tool.name: OGS: createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster'.
tool.command: if [ "$raster_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$raster_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$raster_file' '${$raster_file.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$mesh" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh' '${$mesh.element_identifier}'; fi; createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster $output_refined_raster #if str($refine).strip() != 'None' and str($refine).strip() != '': --refine '$refine' #end if --raster-file '$raster_file.element_identifier' --property-name '$property_name' --mesh '$mesh.element_identifier' --out-mesh output_1.vtu

param.name: output_refined_raster
param.label: output refined raster
param.help: Write refined raster to an additional, new ASC file.

param.name: refine
param.label: refine
param.help: refinement factor that raises the resolution of the raster data

param.name: raster_file
param.label: raster file
param.help: Input (.asc). the input ASC raster file

param.name: property_name
param.label: property name
param.help: the property the values are stored for

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: Input (.vtu). The input mesh is read from this file

tool.help: This tool runs the **createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
